title: Irtiza's Portfolio for Anthropic
summary: Hi there! This is a portfolio tailored for Anthropic. Here, I quickly put together a scripted, edited, and animated video around Claude Code as well as some writing from my time working with Snapchat in the past year.

sections.title: Demo: "Getting Started With Claude Code"
content: **Description: ** This is a short explainer video based on this [talk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gv0WHhKelSE) at Code w/ Claude. Every asset and animation from the following video was custom designed for the purposes of this portfolio.

sections.title: Developer Guides: Developing for AR on the Snapchat Spectacles
content: **Description: ** A series of explainer guides I created for fellow developers building AR experiences with Snapchat Spectacles. This was a three part series that covered some of the core ideas required for developing on the AR development engine.
